title: ARRAY_PREPEND | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Returns an array containing the new element as well as all elements from the source array. The new element is positioned at the beginning of the array.

When you pass a structured array to the function, the function returns a structured
array of the same type.

If array is a structured ARRAY, the type of the new element must
be coercible to the type of the ARRAY.
The example below shows that the prepended element is placed at the beginning of the array:
